title: Out of Plans
description: THE NEW PLAN:  * Find Marc * DON'T find Marc * Take down a Russian Bratva boss * Don't have sex with Kingsley * Find Marc * Take down a Colombian drug lord * Don't fall for Marc again * DON'T FIND MARC * Kill every .. * * *SCREW THE PLAN AND JUST WING IT  This is the story of what happens when best laid plans fail, and a vengeful woman is forced to find her own way once again. A bond broken, trust shattered, and too many lies to keep track of find Marc and Lily all out of plans and running out of time. Can they find their way back to each other before trouble finds them first, or is it really the end of their journey?
author: Stylo Fantome
